testcase.classname: To Verify My Files Tabs Functionality
testcase.name: To verify download functionality of signed document of DrySign
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL "https://drysign-qa.exela.global/#/"..................passed When enter the user name as "sid39@mailinator.com"..........................passed When enter the password as"Malin@555".......................................passed And user click on the sign in button........................................passed And user click on continue with free version................................passed And user click on My Files..................................................passed And user click on signed tab................................................passed And user click on View icon under Action column.............................passed And user should get display document........................................passed Then user click on Close icon...............................................passed When user click on Download icon............................................passed Then Document should get downloaded on local storage as "Holidays List 2022 Updated.pdf".passed
